main event: A pilot observed 4 elongated white lights flying over Burlington, Vermont, which made a sudden 90-degree turn and disappeared behind a cloud layer.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2-3 minutes.,The pilot was flying at a steady altitude of 5000 ft.,The lights were flying from south to north at high speed.,The report indicates insufficient data for definitive evaluation.,Other sightings were reported in the Proctor, Vermont area at the same time.
